strategy_reasoning: Visualizing OpenClaw as a cute pixel robot helper reinforces the 'friendly tools' brand value. The sequence shows introduction, easy setup (collaboration), and readiness, translating technical integration into a cozy narrative of making a new friend.
visual_style: Cozy 8-bit pixel art with chunky sprites, soft ambient lighting, and a palette dominated by lime green (#ecf874) and soft pastels. Nostalgic retro-gaming aesthetic like Stardew Valley.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute chubby 8-bit bee mascot meeting a friendly tiny pixel robot (representing OpenClaw) in a lush digital garden. The bee has a round yellow body, brown stripes, pink blush, and small blue wings. The robot is cute, boxy, and friendly. Background is a soft lime green (#ecf874) and mint gradient with pixel flowers. Warm sunlight filtering through. 8-bit aesthetic, soft and nostalgic. Text in pixel font floating above: 'New Friend!'.
images.description: Introduces OpenClaw as a friendly new addition to the ecosystem.

images.prompt: Pixel art interior scene of a cozy workspace. The bee mascot and the tiny pixel robot are looking at a retro computer screen together. The screen glows with a lime green (#ecf874) progress bar that says 'Auto-Setup'. The room has pastel lavender walls, potted pixel plants, and a rug. Warm lamp lighting. Cozy lo-fi vibes like the game Unpacking. Represents the auto-install and onboarding features.
images.description: Shows the ease of setup (auto-install) as a cozy collaborative moment.

images.prompt: Celebratory pixel art scene. The bee mascot and the robot are high-fiving (or looking happy) surrounded by blooming pixel flowers. The robot now has a shiny polished look (representing branding updates). Background is a dreamy peach to lime green (#ecf874) gradient. Sparkles and hearts in 8-bit style. Text in pixel font at the bottom: 'Ready to Build'. Warm, inviting, and successful atmosphere.
images.description: Highlights the polished branding and readiness of the tool.
